channel.title: Transformer on Nemo's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Transformer on Nemo's Blog

item.title: Titans: Learning to Memorize at Test Time
item.description: This article introduces Titans, a novel architecture that as a meta in-context learner, learns to memorize at test time. Through designing a long-term memory module, and proposing three variants of Titans (MAC, MAG, MAL), the model achieves superior performance compared to Transformers and other baselines, especially in long-context tasks.
